item.description:
1. Meta releases AI model to enhance Metaverse experience  Reuters
  2. Meta debuts a tool for watermarking AI-generated videos  TechCrunch
  3. Facebook-parent Meta’s latest AI model can make human-like avatars in the metaverse  The Times of India
  4. Meta rolls out internal AI tool as it pushes into business market  Financial Times
  5. Meta Poaches Salesforce CEO of AI, Clara Shih, to Build AI Business Tools  eWeek
